meanings.definition: Having the necessary qualifications or credentials.
meanings.sent1: The credentialed doctor quickly diagnosed the illness.
meanings.sent2: She is a credentialed expert in the field of astronomy.
meanings.sent3: The credentialed chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: His credentialed background made him the perfect candidate for the job.
meanings.sent5: The credentialed pilot safely landed the plane during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The university will credentialed the new graduates.
meanings.sent2: She credentialed herself with a valid ID card.
meanings.sent3: He credentialed his dog as a therapy animal.
meanings.sent4: The company will credentialed all employees for security purposes.
meanings.sent5: The organization credentialed the volunteers for the event.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that issues credentials.
meanings.sent1: The credentialed is responsible for verifying the qualifications of applicants.
meanings.sent2: She works as a credentialed for a renowned certification agency.
meanings.sent3: The credentialed had a long line of people waiting to get their certificates.
meanings.sent4: The school hired a new credentialed to handle student records.
meanings.sent5: The online platform partnered with a trusted credentialed to validate user profiles.
